page.title: 15Clubs in Malhamdale
page.content:
In Airton there is an active and enthusiastic Women's Institute,plus a weekly painting class.A needlework class is held sporadically at Kirkby Malham School,although this has become less popular in recent years.There is also a Youth Club held in Kirkby Malham Village Hall,and sometimes a badminton club.The local pub in Kirkby Malham boasts both a darts and a dominoes team which travel to nearby pubs throughout the Winter.
Education in Malhamdale There is only one school in the block-Kirkby Malham Primary,and this gathers its pupils from the whole dale.The children from the dale must then travel to Skipton (10 miles) or Settle (7 miles) for secondary education.
